testcase.name: US_21_08_staff_edit_patient
testcase.system-out: Given US21 user goes to medunna url.........................................passed When US21 user navigates to profile icon and clicks it......................passed And US21 user click sign in button..........................................passed Then US21 click username field..............................................passed And US21 user enters usernameUS21 "team89staff01" as staff..................passed And US21 user enters passwordUS21 "team89staff" as staff....................passed Then US21 user clicks Sign-in button........................................passed And US21 user navigates to MY PAGES Button and click it....................passed And US21 click search patient button from dropdown..........................passed Then US21 User Enters valid SSN number "890-12-4324"........................passed And US21 User navigates to Show Appointments of patient and clicks..........passed And US21 User clicks the edit button of the first appointment...............passed Then US21 User can update the status "CANCELLED" CANCELLED , "PENDING" PENDING or "UNAPPROVED" UNAPPROVED.passed And US21 User selects the doctor who is the current doctor..................passed Then US21 User clicks Save button and verifies that is saved................passed And US21 Staff close the application.......................................passed
